nodes.text: Ashteri's Cloud was a vast drift of ionized tuderium gas that floated along one edge of the Kessel sector as of 44 ABY. That year, Ashteri's Cloud was visited by Lando Calrissian and his starship, the Rockhound. There, Calrissian and Jedi Knight Jaina Solo were attacked by a group of Sith pirates looking for starships to capture for their fleet.
